name: Furious Car Drift Racing: US Car Driving Simulator
name_original: Furious Car Drift Racing: US Car Driving Simulator
description:
The newest and the most addictive racing game is finally here! Get the best cars and conquer the road! Speed, power and hours of fun are waiting for you in this new game.

Be reckless: Stay close to the back of the car in front of you to get speed bonuses. But not too close, if you crush you will be stranded alone in the road!

Collect all the thunders of the road to get the turbo bonus. Overtake all the cars, become the king of the road, crush them out to get more points while going full throttle!

Are you able to get to the tolls before the time runs out? Otherwise you will stay lying in the middle of the highway, so you better hit hard the throttle!

Come on, the race is on fire! Download the game and let’s start this breathtaking race.

Twitter: @bravocterogames
Facebook: www.facebook.com/bravocterogames
